document.bingtitle: Fast food turns to violence - SentinelSource.com: National World
document.webtitle: Fast food turns to violence - SentinelSource.com: National World
document.description: NEW YORK — A cashier at a New York fast food restaurant has been charged with ... women entered the store, placed their order and then began arguing with the cashier ...

Fast food turns to violence
Police say cashier beat two unruly customers
